issue.title: [CI][Release] Source Release and Merge Script jobs fail on master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After the new release the jobs for Source Release and Merge scripts are failing:
```java

      [["-    <version>11.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>",
       "+    <version>12.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>"]], 
```
See example of failure here:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/actions/runs/3335545184/jobs/5519633889

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18172?focusedCommentId=17625323) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
ARROW-18167 / https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14522 fixed this too.
